FuncDef: This command creates an SNTP server for unicast client mode.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the SNTP server. Values-a.b.c.d.
Specifies the SNTP version supported by this server. Values-1 to 3. ParamDefault: Default- 3

Specifies the preference value for this SNTP server. When more than one time-server is configured, one server can have preference over others. The value for that server should be set to preferred. Only one server in the table can be a preferred server. ParamDefault: Default- normal
Specifies the frequency at which this server is queried. Values-64 to 1024. ParamDefault: Default- 64
